A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Over disneyfied\, terrible plot\, no character development what so ever\, characters are removed after so many questions are left unanswered\, and it's filled with joke after joke giving it a not so Star Wars to it but more of a guardians of the galaxy 3 feel. So much injustice done to the character of Luke Skywalker and the legacy of Star Wars. This movie gives me no hope for the ninth installment.
